section.title: CampPlacementIndicator/Required_furniture_to_place
section.para: Required: The Furniture object to place with this indicator. Fill only the furniture or the activator, not both. }

section.title: CampPlacementIndicator/Required_activator_to_place
section.para: Required: The Activator object to place with this indicator. Fill only the furniture or the activator, not both. }

section.title: CampPlacementIndicator/Required_inventory_item
section.para: Required: The Misc Item that starts this placement indicator. }

section.title: CampPlacementIndicator/height_adjustment
section.para: (Default: 1.0) How much to adjust the placement indicator up or down. Useful if indicator is always above or below the ground. }

section.title: CampPlacementIndicator/z_angle_adjustment
section.para: (Default: 0.0) How much to adjust the placement indicator's z angle (compass rotation). Useful if indicator is always facing the wrong way. }

section.title: CampPlacementIndicator/snap_to_terrain
section.para: (Default: True) Whether this object should rotate according to the slope of the terrain. Results in a more natural position. }

section.title: CampPlacementIndicator/indicator_distance
section.para: (Default: 300.0) The distance from the player to render the indicator. }
